channel.title: API Service on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in API Service on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Test with an API Service sample app
item.description: Test with an API Service sample app In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Use a sample app to test the OIN Integration This doc is obviously dependent on the availability of a sample app.

item.title: Build your API Service
item.description: Build your API Service In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a summary redirect linking to other content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Provide links to how to build an API service to one or more docs with the following IDs ID: 424 - Access Okta APIs with user’s credentials ID: 425 - Access Okta APIs with machine credentials Content type: Summary redirect

item.title: Prepare you API Service for the OIN
item.description: Prepare you API Service for the OIN In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Add content on how to use the API Service Integration form.
